recipe.name: Taco Pie
recipe.ingredient: 1 pkg. Corn bread or corn muffin mix
recipe.notes: Following instructions on seasoning pkt to prepare taco beef.
Spread prepared beef in casserole dish. Blanket with cheese. Cover with corn bread batter. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes, or until cornbread is done.
